modName: Requiem - Legend of the Beast Slayer By Bizous
summary: Patch to Legend of the Beast Slayer by Kallel for Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys

First , sorry for my bad english ins't my native language.

What is it ?

- This is a patch to Legend of the Beast Slayer by Kallel.
Original mod : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54872/?


What are the modifications ?

- No longer required to do the quest but :
Light armor to this armor has been added : Glass Smithing Perk required.
Heavy armor : Ebony Smithing Perk required.

Do not forget to endorse both files please :)

------------------------------------
Mod :

Legend of the beast : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2872221/?
Requiem : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?
-------------------------------------
Credit :

Kallel
Ugerboss

------------------------------------

Enjoy !
author: Bizous
